abstract.p: List of Independence Day closings in New York area

block.p: GOVERNMENT OFFICES -- Closed. POST OFFICES -- Express Mail only; main post office on Eighth Avenue at 32nd Street is open. BANKS -- Closed. PARKING -- Alternate-side regulations will be suspended. SANITATION -- No pickups, street cleaning or recycling. FINANCIAL MARKETS -- Stock and bond markets closed. TRANSPORTATION -- New York City subways and buses will operate on a Saturday schedule, with additional service to viewing locations for the holiday's events. Long Island Rail Road and Metro-North will operate on holiday schedules.
